content: *ahem* If I'm not mistaken... {A歪头}are you saying you're okay with me carving out a little space of my own in your territory?
info: 邀请萨飞里-萨飞里_主流程文本3

content: So, if I'm staying, do I need to register or something?
info: 邀请萨飞里-萨飞里_主流程文本3

content: You know what this means, right?
info: 邀请萨飞里-萨飞里_主流程文本3

content: {A不好意思}*ahem* So that's what you meant. My dream's always been to set foot on each and every planet... But your idea doesn't sound so bad either.
info: 邀请萨飞里-萨飞里_主流程文本3

content: Alright then, I'll start packing first... not that I've got a lot of stuff...
